name: Expose the Anthropophobia Viruses
description: The King's NFT: B2C1 - Anthropophobia Viruses is an NFT project by @MyMyReceipt. The 1st collection from the 2nd batch (B2/C1), also the 1st programmatically generated NFT collection of twelve thousand (12k) unique Abstract Scribbles of the Anthropophobia Viruses, each one verified unique. All abstract scribble layers are made by @MyReceipt's son. #mengeruikhans!!!
